tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mowers (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   brand VARCHAR(50),
   model VARCHAR(50),
   serial_number VARCHAR(50),
   maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tractors (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   brand VARCHAR(50),
   model VARCHAR(50),
   serial_number VARCHAR(50),
   maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_systems (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   brand VARCHAR(50),
   model VARCHAR(50),
   serial_number VARCHAR(50),
   maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_id INT,
   schedule_date DATE,
   maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
   notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedules (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    scheduled_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    technician VARCHAR(255),
    details TEXT
);
